document.heading: Exploratory Committee Regulation Amendment Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-104, the “Exploratory Committee Regulation Amendment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-36 which was referred to the Committee on Workforce Development and Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 2, 2007, and November 6, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 28, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-223 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-104 became effective on February 2, 2008.
